channel.title: Beginner Question
channel.description:
Hey,
I wanted to start scripting as I do have some background knowledge of scripting and I was looking at some tutorials and I pretty much understand the whole concept of scripting a RSPS. One thing I can not get though is a good base to get the ball rolling :/... I do not understand these new bases that I found in the server download section. I can not find the client.java or any of the things I have been basing my knowledge upon... Please can someone tell me, and link me if possible, of a good and stable base I should start scripting on. Thanks for your help.

item.title: Beginner Question
item.dc:creator: @Doxx Doxx
item.description:
@Doxx wrote:

Oh thank you guys so much, Bronze Age seems to be what I was looking to get. Again thank you and hopefully I can get better at coding and move on to Hyperion.

Read full topic

item.title: Beginner Question
item.dc:creator: @Adobe Adobe
item.description:
@Adobe wrote:

Edit: (gave the link)

c o l d:

Bronze Age HINT: https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,461231.msg3374195.html#msg3374195 : HINT

item.title: Beginner Question
item.dc:creator: @c_o_l_d c o l d
item.description:
@c_o_l_d wrote:

Doxx:

Is PI 317? Or is it the newer looking thing. I want a 317 not newer version looking one, anyone recommend any good 317 that I can start scripting on that are reliable? Thanks guys

A good delta base for a 317 to start learning from/coding imo would be Bronze Age HINT: use the search bar : HINT
Since you mentioned the client.java that why I suggested a Delta base, most server editing is done there.

Read full topic

item.title: Beginner Question
item.dc:creator: @Pro4Show Pro4Show
item.description:
@Pro4Show wrote:

download a basic cammy pvp source. it is easy to find files and easy to add codes such as commands etc… that is how i startered. GL

Read full topic

item.title: Beginner Question
item.dc:creator: @Doxx Doxx
item.description:
@Doxx wrote:

Okay can you link me to a PI source then? I want something that I actually can be able to add things to, not one of those fully made “bases” were there are NPCS and Shops and so on, is there a PI base with only the basics?

Also (please answer):

  1. How can I edit a Hyperion server, what is the client.java in hyperion?

  2. How can I edit a PI server, what is the client.java in PI?

Thank you for the help

Read full topic

item.title: Beginner Question
item.dc:creator: @Doxx Doxx
item.description:
@Doxx wrote:

But can you explain for example in Hyperion how I can start editing the server? I cannot find a client.java to open up the code and add my own things into the script. That is why I did not want to begin to start in Hyperion too much stuff I can not find so I can edit the server… Thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: Beginner Question
item.dc:creator: @Shadowspkin Shadowspkin
item.description:
@Shadowspkin wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I, post:1, topic:404170”][quote author=Shadowspkin link=topic=501223.msg3666958#msg3666958 date=1310677493]
If you truly know java- Hyperion

If you got an idea but you look like this guy sometimes --> - Then PI

If your told to change the client name and you look like this guy --> :eek: - Then Delta

If you dislike the suggestions I gave you then go to (Need atleast a PI level of java)- Shards,Stonefall,RiotScape.
[/quote]You don’t really need any understanding of Java to work with any of the bases. You’ll learn if you try, no matter what server.[/quote]

I was just pointing him to simplest things to work with to the harder ones.

Read full topic

item.title: Beginner Question
item.dc:creator: @Doxx Doxx
item.description:
@Doxx wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I, post:1, topic:404170”][quote author=Shadowspkin link=topic=501223.msg3666958#msg3666958 date=1310677493]
If you truly know java- Hyperion

If you got an idea but you look like this guy sometimes --> - Then PI

If your told to change the client name and you look like this guy --> :eek: - Then Delta

If you dislike the suggestions I gave you then go to (Need atleast a PI level of java)- Shards,Stonefall,RiotScape.
[/quote]You don’t really need any understanding of Java to work with any of the bases. You’ll learn if you try, no matter what server.[/quote]

Yeah I get that with practice you get better at coding, but I do not understand the way to even begin coding in for example: Hyperon… I cannot find a client.java or something similar to begin coding in the base, so any help would be appreciated on how to begin editing the base.

Read full topic

item.title: Beginner Question
item.dc:creator: @Doxx Doxx
item.description:
@Doxx wrote:

Im more of the PI guy, once in a while, as I just started, I have a question or two. Anyway can you link me to the PI download link/thread? As when I use the search I run into hundreds of threads and links, not sure which one is the right one…

Read full topic

item.title: Beginner Question
item.dc:creator: @Doxx Doxx
item.description:
@Doxx wrote:

As I said I have no problem with keeping up with the “current” bases but the only roadblock is I cannot find the, client.java, file and I do not have a clue on how to edit the server and make it compatible with what I want added to it, so pretty much with these bases since I cannot find a way to edit them or add things to them, I can not script… So if you can tell me for example how in the world to edit a hyperon or whatever the base is called, I would be glad to use it as my base, but as I said I do not know how to edit it.

Read full topic

item.title: Beginner Question
item.dc:creator: @metal_k0 metal k0
item.description:
@metal_k0 wrote:

There are different bases… just download whatever you like using the most… although I suggest to keep up with the community as they most likely will improve.

Read full topic
